title: Ukraine - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Ukraine stands at CCC+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Ukraine was last set at Caa3 with negative outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Ukraine was last reported at CC with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Ukraine thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Ukraine as reported by major credit rating agencies.
